title: Carlyle Earnings Jump as Private-Equity Portfolio Rises
body:
Carlyle Group Inc. reported a big jump in third-quarter earnings, and the amount of cash that could be returned to shareholders reached record levels.
The Washington, D.C., firm reported net income of $532.8 million, or $1.46 a share, in the three months that ended Sept. 30. That compares with net income of $295.5 million, or 82 cents a share, in the same period last year.
